name: Scary Zombie Target
description:
Scary Zombie Target is first person shooter of eye-popping 3D graphics combined with blood boiling zombie survival strategy game. All survivors are driven by one goal: stay alive as long as you can!
Features:

Multiple amazing levels and environments
Multiple weapons and zooming option
Stunning graphics and sound effects
Scary zombie dogs with challenging missions
Easy and smooth first person control
Realistic horror Jungle environment
